extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware for Affected Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware of affected Mitsubishi Electric products to the specified versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewall and VPN
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a firewall and virtual private network (VPN) to prevent unauthorized access when Internet access is required.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Anti-Virus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install anti-virus software on the PC that can access the product to protect against malware.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use LAN and block access from untrusted networks and hosts through firewalls to secure the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Physical Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict physical access to the affected product and the LAN to which the product is connected to prevent unauthorized physical access.

extracted_playbook.title: Use IP Filter Function
extracted_playbook.description: Use the IP filter function to block access from untrusted hosts. Refer to the product manuals for detailed instructions.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

affected_products: M800VW (BND-2051W000-**): Update to B2 or later

M800S (BND-2006W000-**): Update to FJ or later

M80W (BND-2008W000-**): Update to FJ or later
